description: Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref: 38421/APP/2021/4045, dated 25-11-22 (Redevelopment of the site to deliver data centre campus including: two data centre buildings (Use Class B8); associated energy and electricity infrastructure, buildings, and plant; security gatehouse, systems and enclosures; works to the highway, car parking and cycle parking; hard and soft landscaping; as well as associated infrastructure, ancillary office use, and associated external works) to make amendments to the design of Building 1 (Eastern Building) and amend Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans).
decision_conditions: Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) of planning permission reference 38421/APP/2021/4045, dated 25-11-22, is amended to:

The development hereby permitted (comprising 37,547m2 floorspace within two data centre buildings (Use Class B8) measuring up to 38.42m in height, substation building, tank room and gatehouse and 65 no. car parking spaces), shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers:
For information and clarity, the following plans are hereby superseded:
For information and clarity, the following plans are hereby approved:
